<h3 id="X8227">X(8227)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd EULER AND HEXYL</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (a^4-(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2)/a : :
<br>
<b>
X(8227)=X(1)+4*X(5) = 6*X(2)-X(40)
</b>
<p>
<p>X(8227) lies on these lines: {1,5}, {2,40}, {3,1699}, {4,1125}, {8,5056}, {9,6832}, {10,3090}, {19,7537}, {20,5550}, {30,7987}, {35,6911}, {36,3560}, {46,6862}, {55,6918}, {56,6913}, {57,499}, {63,6884}, {72,5231}, {78,5178}, {84,5249}, {140,165}, {142,6847}, {226,3086}, {354,5777}, {381,1385}, {388,6939}, {392,7686}, {405,5715}, {411,5284}, {442,7681}, {474,2077}, {497,6864}, {498,1697}, {515,3091}, {516,631}, {517,1656}, {519,5071}, {547,3656}, {551,944}, {580,748}, {581,3720}, {590,1702}, {615,1703}, {908,6886}, {936,2886}, {942,5693}, {950,6843}, {958,5087}, {960,5705}, {988,3944}, {993,6920}, {997,6829}, {999,5290}, {1001,3149}, {1012,3838}, {1056,3947}, {1071,3742}, {1158,3306}, {1203,5707}, {1210,3485}, {1420,1478}, {1449,5816}, {1453,5713}, {1479,3601}, {1482,3679}, {1490,8226}, {1519,5437}, {1537,6667}, {1538,3824}, {1572,7746}, {1621,6796}, {1706,6983}, {1737,3340}, {1770,6892}, {1836,5433}, {1902,5094}, {2257,5747}, {2550,6700}, {2646,3586}, {3085,6964}, {3295,7743}, {3338,3582}, {3359,6958}, {3525,6361}, {3526,3579}, {3533,5493}, {3542,7713}, {3544,3636}, {3577,6933}, {3583,3612}, {3585,6929}, {3617,5734}, {3622,5068}, {3628,7991}, {3632,5079}, {3634,4301}, {3653,3845}, {3655,5066}, {3813,6765}, {3814,6975}, {3816,6831}, {3822,6941}, {3825,6830}, {3832,5731}, {3877,7504}, {3894,6583}, {3901,5694}, {3911,4295}, {3925,6769}, {4187,7680}, {4292,7288}, {4298,5714}, {4299,6930}, {4302,6885}, {4304,5225}, {4311,5229}, {4466,6173}, {4512,7483}, {4652,5057}, {4668,5844}, {4679,5812}, {5010,6924}, {5082,6745}, {5119,6959}, {5248,6905}, {5253,5450}, {5274,5703}, {5316,6766}, {5438,6854}, {5439,6001}, {5535,6852}, {5542,5817}, {5709,6861}, {5805,6675}, {5880,6691}, {5887,5902}, {6256,6957}, {6261,6828}, {6282,7956}, {6856,7682}, {6860,7971}, {6887,7308}, {6914,7280}, {6946,7704}, {6981,7962}, {7529,8185}, {7675,7678}, {7688,8167}, {8081,8085}, {8082,8086}, {8228,8234}, {8229,8235}</p>
<p>
X(8227) = midpoint of X(i),X(j) for these (i,j):  (3091,3616), (3617,5734)<br>
X(8227) = reflection of X(1698 in X(1655)<br>
X(8227) = X(3091)-of-Fuhrmann-triangle<br>
X(8227) = X(3)-of-cross-triangle of these triangles: Aquila and anti-Aquila<br>
X(8227) = homothetic center of Ae (aka K798e) triangle and cross-triangle of 2nd Fuhrmann and Ae triangles<br>
</p>
